title: The Shapes of Midnight
description: Stay back! The shadow places shelter secrets that are best left undisturbed. Hear me! Or don't. For there are those obsessed with uncovering the witcheries that fester in man's foul heart. There are those who would invoke the awful powers that yet remain in Earth's cursed places. Joseph Payne Brenna is such a one. This is his book. Dare you make it yours?
